message.body: I have a large backpack that you could borrow, though I wouldn't call it a backpacking pack per se. I could bring it over and you could test it out if you like.
Is it the green one you have has a long time? Would it fit a tent?
Yep, that's the one. It would probably fit a smaller tent. Worth testing, certainly.
Perfect. I used that to get this same tent to Paul Pitchoford camp. If I could borrow it again that would be great!
